TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_R’ra’, title = R’ra’, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/R’ra’} }

S.FORM: alang R'ra' ga niya mki sku Sincik Keng atu Gpho go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 67 buwan, 176 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 88% kyan ku 155 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 12% kyan ku 21 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Tayan 87%, binah lihuyan s'uli 1%. maki qu ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na R'ra' hya' ga llyung. tay 'zil na R'ra' hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkyahu' na R'ra' hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkraya' na R'ra' hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay 'zil na R'ra' hya' ga Oro'raw. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang R'ra' ga niya mki sko Sincik Keng ato Gpho go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 67 bowan, 176 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 88% kyan ko 155 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 12% kyan ko 21 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Tayan 87%, binah lihoyan s'oli 1%. maki qo ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na R'ra' hya' ga llyong. tay 'zil na R'ra' hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay mkyaho' na R'ra' hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay mkraya' na R'ra' hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay 'zil na R'ra' hya' ga Oro'raw. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
